title: Turkey barley soup
ingredients: ['1 leftover turkey carcass', '2.5L water, or chicken or vegetable stock', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon poultry seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'garlic salt to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', '125g pearl barley']
